text.0: engendering the sun in floods engendering heavens lights greenhued.
text.1: robed in the waters and the milk.
text.2: according to primeval plan this soma with his stream effused.
text.3: flows purely on a god for gods.
text.4: for him victorious waxen great the juices with a thousand powers.
text.6: shedding the ancient fluid he is poured into the cleansing sieve.
text.7: he thundering hath produced the gods.
text.8: soma while purifying sends hither all things to be desired.
text.9: he sends the gods who strengthen law.
text.10: soma effused pour on us wealth in kine in heroes steeds and spoil.
text.11: send us abundant store of food.
